data: {"generalSituation":"Winds will be weak over Guangdong today and tomorrow. It will be warm during the day and relatively humid in the morning and at night. A fresh to strong northeast monsoon is expected to reach the coast of southern China from the night of Lunar New Year's Eve to Lunar New Year's Day. It will be cloudier over the region. It will be cool in the morning over the coastal areas on the second and third days of Lunar New Year.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260214","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"Light winds force 2.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine.
